body:
from http://www.slightlymagic.net/forum/viewtopic.php?f=82&t=12809&p=139990#p139990 -

It would be great to have the possibility to hide/show new log with button click. Most of the time I don't need this log, but sometimes during the game it is necessary to view latest actions.

Could you please do this?
author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)
title: hide/disable game log

comments.body:
Fixed in build 1.44.618 ( https://buildhive.cloudbees.com/job/melvinzhang/job/magarena/618/ ).

I have added a new preferences setting ("show game log messages") that lets you turn the game log on/off by default. During a game you can switch the log on/off by clicking the log caption/titlebar.

**Status:** Fixed
